name: Big Data Value AISBL
membership: BDVA is member of the Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition.
goal: To boost European Big Data Value research, development and innovation
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
BDVA is the private side of the Big Data cPPP

Through its strategic research and innovation agendas and other activities it hopes to influence the EU investment and direciton in the field of Big Data in Europe
